verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees הִנֵּ֤ה׀ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold בָּרֲכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chu Behold bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ye the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei all [ye] servants יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD הָעֹמְדִ֥ים <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-me-Dim stand בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> be-veit- in the house יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> bal-lei-Lot. which by night

שְׂאֽוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> se-'u- Lift up יְדֵכֶ֥ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-de-Chem your hands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh; [in] the sanctuary וּ֝בָרֲכוּ <S%H1288><s%> U-va-ra-chu and bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

יְבָרֶכְךָ֣ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-rech-Cha bless יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> mitz-tzi-Yon; thee out of Zion עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh, that made שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz. and earth
